ygData.subject: Re: "Words", Pricing and info
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is a Magician Word, so all you necromancers can forget this one (Also THE most common) - To the seller...better off selling it to the shops. ... This
ygData.messageBody:
Remlin wrote:

> I have these items and wondering there worth, btw if u want them i will be auctioning them off tonite on Rallos Zek....
>
> Words of Tyranny

This is a Magician Word, so all you necromancers can forget this one (Also THE most common) - To the seller...better off
selling it to the shops.

>
> Words of Spirt

This word is for Necromancers - But is also Common. (I pay 1pp for ANY word on my server but have no clue on yours.)

>
> Words of Sentinent
>

This word is slightly less common, but by no means rare. Again 1pp.

>
> 2x Wooden Totem
>

These things are completely worthless...except that they sell for a plat to a vendor...hehe
Unfortunatly +5 mana is really not very good...better off getting a Skull of Jhen'Tra.

>
> I noticed that one of the "words" isn't stackalble, so I assumed it was rare.
>

This is not the case...just another case of Verant saying "Oops". Many of the Words are unstackable...you will see this in
the future. (Why all the rocks stack, but not all the pieces of paper is beyond my logic.)

> But average price would be nice to hear about.
>

Again I pay no more than 1 plat for words.

>
> Thanks
> Chris
> Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
> Rallos Zek

Kalekona Keali'i, Lvl 30 Teir'Dal Necromancer, Bertoxxulous
